$DOT GOD candle incoming .... And tomorrow most likely.


Polkadot closed inside of the Keltmer Channel on 1D timeframe and that was a bullish engulfing candle plus RSI is still at oversold area so is the stochastic rsi on 1D timeframe. KC and BB's top is 3.3$ on 1D timeframe, 5$ on 1W timeframe. Last pump Dot made after the bog crash from 4$ down to 2.8$(against USD not usdt) it closed inside of the KC and that was engulfing the next 1D candle was doji(same as today's 1D candle that will possibly close as Doji(indecision of the market) but the next candle of the latest big pump(that pumped to 3.5$) was GOD candle meaning in one single day we saw 40% price increase on Dot. Now the same scenario is happening and logically tomorrow we will see a big pump.
